_sText:
This is a version of an old  map i made for COUNTER-STRIKE 1.6

for more screenshots : 

http://m4ppeu.site.voila.fr/photos/as_de_r0ok/album/as_de_r0ok.html



if you like it i'll change some things to be more like HL2 maps
-changing for better resolution textures
-adding displacement
-put costum models
-make a real navigation mesh...

things like that

for now i did'nt have the time for that....so i just convert TEXTURES and put HDR in it

but the gameplay stay the same

you can play BOMB/DIFFUSE only or adding VIP MOD (assassination)
it's all at the PLAYERS CHOICE :D

anyway i hope you'll enjoy it
